articles.author: Jamie Smyth
articles.title: 'Jewel in the crown': Chevron follows Exxon to Guyana's oil riches - Financial Times
articles.description: US supermajors open a controversial fossil fuel frontier in one of Latin America’s poorest nations
articles.content:
Chevrons deal to buy Hess last week for $53bn gives the US supermajor access to one of the hottest prospects in the global resources industry: Guyanas 11bn barrels of offshore oil.
There was little … [+8573 chars]

articles.title: Exclusive: G7 to agree AI code of conduct for companies - Reuters
articles.description: The Group of Seven industrial countries will on Monday agree a code of conduct for companies developing advanced artificial intelligence systems, a G7 document showed, as governments seek to mitigate the risks and potential misuse of the technology.
